languages.text: "Сколько праведных слуг Империума пали здесь от орудия, призванного служить им в борьбе с неверными? Сбиты в полете, без возможности защититься, исполнить свою миссию..."

traits.locale_text: "Сколько праведных слуг Империума пали здесь от орудия, призванного служить им в борьбе с неверными? Сбиты в полете, без возможности защититься, исполнить свою миссию..."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "How many righteous servants of the Imperium were felled by a weapon intended to aid them in the struggle against the faithless? Shot down in flight, with no chance to defend themselves or to complete their mission..."
languages.original_text: "Сколько праведных слуг Империума пали здесь от орудия, призванного служить им в борьбе с неверными? Сбиты в полете, без возможности защититься, исполнить свою миссию..."

traits.locale_text: "How many righteous servants of the Imperium were felled by a weapon intended to aid them in the struggle against the faithless? Shot down in flight, with no chance to defend themselves or to complete their mission..."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "How many righteous servants of the Imperium were felled by a weapon intended to aid them in the struggle against the faithless? Shot down in flight, with no chance to defend themselves or to complete their mission..."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "How many righteous servants of the Imperium were felled by a weapon intended to aid them in the struggle against the faithless? Shot down in flight, with no chance to defend themselves or to complete their mission..."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "How many righteous servants of the Imperium were felled by a weapon intended to aid them in the struggle against the faithless? Shot down in flight, with no chance to defend themselves or to complete their mission..."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “这些武器本该用来消灭那些背信弃义之人，但帝国却有多少正义的仆人死在这样的武器之下？他们在空中被击落，根本没机会自保，也没能完成他们的使命……”
languages.original_text: "How many righteous servants of the Imperium were felled by a weapon intended to aid them in the struggle against the faithless? Shot down in flight, with no chance to defend themselves or to complete their mission..."

traits.locale_text: “这些武器本该用来消灭那些背信弃义之人，但帝国却有多少正义的仆人死在这样的武器之下？他们在空中被击落，根本没机会自保，也没能完成他们的使命……”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «¿Cuántos inocentes sirvientes del Imperium cayeron a manos de un arma que debía ayudar a combatir a los infieles? Derribados durante el vuelo, sin oportunidad de defenderse ni completar su misión...».
languages.original_text: "How many righteous servants of the Imperium were felled by a weapon intended to aid them in the struggle against the faithless? Shot down in flight, with no chance to defend themselves or to complete their mission..."

traits.locale_text: «¿Cuántos inocentes sirvientes del Imperium cayeron a manos de un arma que debía ayudar a combatir a los infieles? Derribados durante el vuelo, sin oportunidad de defenderse ni completar su misión...».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「いったいどれほどの正義の使徒が、信仰を持たざる者との戦いで彼らを支援するための武器で倒されたのだ？飛行中に撃墜され、身を守る機会も、使命を果たす機会も得られずに…」
languages.original_text: "How many righteous servants of the Imperium were felled by a weapon intended to aid them in the struggle against the faithless? Shot down in flight, with no chance to defend themselves or to complete their mission..."

traits.locale_text: 「いったいどれほどの正義の使徒が、信仰を持たざる者との戦いで彼らを支援するための武器で倒されたのだ？飛行中に撃墜され、身を守る機会も、使命を果たす機会も得られずに…」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Wie viele rechtschaffene Diener des Imperiums wurden von einer Waffe gefällt, die ihnen im Kampf gegen die Ungläubigen helfen sollte? Einfach abgeschossen, ohne Chance, sich zu verteidigen oder ihre Mission abzuschließen ..."
languages.original_text: "How many righteous servants of the Imperium were felled by a weapon intended to aid them in the struggle against the faithless? Shot down in flight, with no chance to defend themselves or to complete their mission..."

traits.locale_text: "Wie viele rechtschaffene Diener des Imperiums wurden von einer Waffe gefällt, die ihnen im Kampf gegen die Ungläubigen helfen sollte? Einfach abgeschossen, ohne Chance, sich zu verteidigen oder ihre Mission abzuschließen ..."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Combien de fidèles serviteurs de l'Imperium sont tombés sous les coups d'une arme destinée à les aider à vaincre les hérétiques ? Abattus en plein vol, sans la moindre chance de se défendre ou d'achever leur mission... »
languages.original_text: "How many righteous servants of the Imperium were felled by a weapon intended to aid them in the struggle against the faithless? Shot down in flight, with no chance to defend themselves or to complete their mission..."

traits.locale_text: « Combien de fidèles serviteurs de l'Imperium sont tombés sous les coups d'une arme destinée à les aider à vaincre les hérétiques ? Abattus en plein vol, sans la moindre chance de se défendre ou d'achever leur mission... »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Kaç erdemli İmparatorluk hizmetkârı, inançsızlarla mücadelelerinde onlara yardım etmesi için tasarlanmış silahların kurbanı oldu acaba? Kaçının mekiği, kendilerini savunma veya görevlerini tamamlama fırsatına erişemeden düşürüldü?"
languages.original_text: "How many righteous servants of the Imperium were felled by a weapon intended to aid them in the struggle against the faithless? Shot down in flight, with no chance to defend themselves or to complete their mission..."

traits.locale_text: "İnançsızlara karşı mücadelelerinde onlara yardım etmesi için tasarlanmış silahlar nedeniyle kaç tane erdemli İmparatorluk hizmetkârı helak oldu? Kaç tanesi kendilerini savunma veya görevlerini tamamlama şansına bile erişemeden uçuş sırasında indirildi?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: "How many righteous servants of the Imperium were felled by a weapon intended to aid them in the struggle against the faithless? Shot down in flight, with no chance to defend themselves or to complete their mission..."
